name: Adventures in Odyssey Club
description: Subscription service for the award-winning, original audio drama series enjoyed by the whole family.
author: CATEIN

authentication.loginWarning: You must select a profile with a PIN for authentication to complete.

settings.name: Podcasts
settings.description: Show new podcasts in subscription feed

settings.name: Randomizer via Recommended
settings.description: Puts a random episode at the top of recommendations (Recommendations may take longer to load)

settings.name: Faster Randomizer
settings.description: Cache episodes instead of using the random API. Might not include the newest episodes. Default when not logged in.

settings.name: Content Groupings
settings.description: Choose which content groups appear on the playlists tab

settings.name: Comment page size
settings.description: Set how many comments to load on each request. Higher might be slower

settings.name: Enable Experimental Ambient Playback Rerouting
settings.description: Only enable if you are not logged in

11: Fixed upcoming free episodes attempting to play
Badges are now platform playlist instead of content
Description now includes content_body and themes
Description now includes links for Themes and Characters
10: Support for content urls with contentGroup in them
Added Faster Randomizer setting for logged in users
9: u p d a t e
content with null download_url throws UnavailableException
Randomizer now works for logged out users via episode cache system
8: Fixed older club videos not loading
Support for playlist URLs (currently no way to get to them on grayjay)
7: Changed EpisodeHomePage endpoint again to one that gives both video and audio content
Support for badge content (loads the first content id in the badge)
6: Changed EpisodeHomePage API url to one the club might like better
Loading comments might show toast messages when searching for a page maybe?
Added themes support - issue #2 on github
Added weird video URL support - issue #3 on github
5: Finding comments should now use less requests
Added setting for comment page size
Increased EpisodeHomePage size to 30 instead of 25
4: Renamed the plugin to Adventures in Odyssey Club
